alert.note: Alert for St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 2:46PM EDT until July 13 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central St. Lawrence County in northern New York... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 245 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Edwardsville to 7 miles southwest of West Fowler, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Potsdam, Gouverneur, Ogdensburg, Canton, Norfolk, Oswegatchie, Lisbon, Louisville, De Kalb, Fowler, Colton, Morley, Degrasse, Waddington, Richville, Madrid, Rensselaer Falls, Norwood, Edwardsville, and Hermon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
